input.sentences: my friends and i went plane spotting today .
we went to the airport and took pictures of various planes .
some were really nice looking and modern .
others were fairly old but still in service .
the pictures came out great and i 'm sure we 'll visit again .
output.sentences: Public or private airplanes come in all sizes and color.
Just being able to fly with the birds in the air.
You get a different view when you are above the air when you are in a plane.
When traveling in a plane each one is designed in a different way
If its only once in your lifetime try and fly on a plane and see what you may have been missing.
